Class CompressingMetaIndex.CompressingMetaIndexInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.CompressingMetaIndex.CompressingMetaIndexInputFormat

    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable,Wrapper<String[]>>

    CompressingMetaIndex

    public static class CompressingMetaIndex.CompressingMetaIndexInputFormat
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable,Wrapper<String[]>>
    A Hadoop input format for a compressing meta index (allows the reading of a meta index as input to a MapReduce job.
